cyclone.name: HENRI
cyclone.current_location: about 210 mi E of Cape Hatteras North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northeast, expected to slow and bend north-northwest with a landfall on Long Island or the southern New England coast, then track inland across New England
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Long Island or the southern New England coast (near Montauk Point – New Haven area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: East Rockaway Inlet NY to Mastic NY, north of Chatham MA to Sagamore Beach MA, and Cape Cod Bay under Storm Surge Watch
weather_observation.warning_coast: Long Island south shore Fire Island Inlet to Montauk Point and north shore Port Jefferson Harbor to Montauk Point; New Haven CT to west of Westport MA; Block Island under Hurricane Warning. Coastal NY/NJ west of East Rockaway Inlet to Manasquan Inlet (including NYC) under Tropical Storm Warning. Storm-surge warnings from Mastic Beach NY to Chatham MA including LI Sound and Narragansett/Buzzards/Vineyard/Nantucket Sounds.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Mid-Atlantic and Northeast U.S. coasts from New Jersey northward through Long Island, Connecticut, Rhode Island and Massachusetts
weather_observation.rain_fall_above_4_inch: Possible (3–6 inch amounts forecast just north of the port, isolated higher totals)
weather_observation.storm_surge_above_3_feet: Unlikely (Cape May NJ to East Rockaway NY forecast only 1–3 ft)
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds are possible; 24 % cumulative chance of sustained 34 kt winds (25–35 mph) with occasional higher gusts Sunday afternoon into early Monday.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor tidal surge of 1–2 ft possible along the lower Delaware River and adjacent NJ coast during high tide Sunday night.
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands of heavy rain could bring 2–4 inches to the Philadelphia area Sunday–Monday with flash-flood potential.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along the New Jersey shore; isolated tornado threat cannot be ruled out inland.
